law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Retailer" has the meaning stated in § 11-501(i) of this title.
"Sell" has the meaning stated in § 11-501(j) of this title.
"Unpackaged cigarette" means any cigarette not contained in a sealed package of 20 or more cigarettes.
"Vending machine operator" has the meaning stated in § 11-501(k) of this title.
"Wholesaler" has the meaning stated in § 11-501(m) of this title.
